#summary HOWTO create a prefix and domain for a new resource
#labels TechnicalWG,HOWTO

= Introduction =

This page describes how-to register a new prefix with the OBO Foundry and create the corresponding PURL top-domain. There are no requirements for resources that wish to register a prefix or domain, but for the fact that the required namespace be free. 


= Details =

 * Add the prefix to the file ontologies.txt

The files lives at [http://obo.cvs.sourceforge.net/viewvc/obo/obo/website/cgi-bin/ontologies.txt http://obo.cvs.sourceforge.net/viewvc/obo/obo/website/cgi-bin/ontologies.txt], and you will need to have sourceforge access to the OBO project at [https://sourceforge.net/projects/obo/ https://sourceforge.net/projects/obo/]
